SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PAYMENT P JOIN MEMBER_SUBSCRIPTION MS ON P.MS_ID = MS.MS_ID WHERE TRUNC(P.PAY_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND P.PAY_DATE = ( SELECT MIN(P2.PAY_DATE) FROM PAYMENT P2 JOIN MEMBER_SUBSCRIPTION MS2 ON P2.MS_ID = MS2.MS_ID WHERE MS2.MEM_ID = MS.MEM_ID )

SELECT
TO_CHAR(p.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(p.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "dt", SUM(p.PAY_AMOUNT) AS "revenue" FROM PAYMENT p JOIN MEMBER_SUBSCRIPTION ms ON p.MS_ID = ms.MS_ID JOIN MEMBER m ON ms.MEM_ID = m.MEM_ID WHERE p.PAY_AMOUNT > 0 AND p.PAY_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND p.PAY_DATE < TO_DATE(#{to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AND m.MEM_GEN = #{gender} GROUP BY
TO_CHAR(p.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(p.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY "dt" ASC

SELECT
TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "dt", COUNT(*) AS "count" FROM MEMBER_SUBSCRIPTION MS JOIN PAYMENT P ON P.MS_ID = MS.MS_ID JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_ID = MS.MEM_ID WHERE 1=1 AND P.PAY_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND P.PAY_DATE < TO_DATE(#{to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AND M.MEM_GEN = #{gender} GROUP BY
TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY "dt" ASC

SELECT
TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "dt", S.SUB_NAME AS "subName", COUNT(*) AS "count" FROM MEMBER_SUBSCRIPTION MS JOIN PAYMENT P ON P.MS_ID = MS.MS_ID JOIN SUBSCRIBE S ON S.SUB_ID = MS.SUB_ID JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_ID = MS.MEM_ID WHERE 1=1 AND P.PAY_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND P.PAY_DATE < TO_DATE(#{to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AND M.MEM_GEN = #{gender} GROUP BY
TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , S.SUB_NAME ORDER BY "dt", "subName"

SELECT
TO_CHAR(l.PL_CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(l.PL_CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "dt",
-- '나의 활동 - 이력서' 로그 카운트 COUNT(CASE WHEN l.PL_TITLE = '이력서AI요청' THEN 1 END) AS "resumeCnt",
-- '나의 활동 - 자기소개서' 로그 카운트 COUNT(CASE WHEN l.PL_TITLE = '자기소개서AI요청' THEN 1 END) AS "coverCnt"
-- 참고: 모의면접 로그가 있다면 여기에 추가 -- COUNT(CASE WHEN l.PL_TITLE = '모의면접AI요청' THEN 1 END) AS "mockCnt"
FROM PAGE_LOG l JOIN MEMBER m ON l.MEM_ID = m.MEM_ID WHERE l.PL_TITLE IN ('이력서AI요청', '자기소개서AI요청' ,'모의면접AI요청')
AND l.PL_CREATED_AT >= TO_DATE(#{from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND l.PL_CREATED_AT < TO_DATE(#{to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1
AND m.MEM_GEN = #{gender}
AND m.MEM_BIRTH IS NOT NULL AND CASE WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(l.PL_CREATED_AT), m.MEM_BIRTH)/12) < 20 THEN '10대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(l.PL_CREATED_AT), m.MEM_BIRTH)/12) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(TRUNC(l.PL_CREATED_AT), m.MEM_BIRTH)/12) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' ELSE '40대 이상' END = #{ageBand}
GROUP BY
TO_CHAR(l.PL_CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(l.PL_CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
ORDER BY "dt" ASC

WITH DATES AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1 AS "dt" FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ), REVENUE AS ( SELECT TRUNC(PAY_DATE) AS "dt", SUM(PAY_AMOUNT) AS "revenue" FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAY_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 6 AND PAY_AMOUNT > 0 GROUP BY TRUNC(PAY_DATE) ) SELECT TO_CHAR(D."dt", 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "dt", NVL(R."revenue", 0) AS "revenue" FROM DATES D LEFT JOIN REVENUE R ON D."dt" = R."dt" ORDER BY D."dt" ASC

WITH NEW_MEMBERS AS ( SELECT
TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "dt", COUNT(*) AS "newMemberCount" FROM MEMBER WHERE 1=1 AND CREATED_AT >= TO_DATE(#{from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CREATED_AT < TO_DATE(#{to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 GROUP BY
TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
), NEW_SUBS AS ( SELECT
TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "dt", COUNT(*) AS "newSubscriberCount" FROM PAYMENT P JOIN MEMBER_SUBSCRIPTION MS ON P.MS_ID = MS.MS_ID WHERE P.PAY_DATE = ( SELECT MIN(P2.PAY_DATE) FROM PAYMENT P2 JOIN MEMBER_SUBSCRIPTION MS2 ON P2.MS_ID = MS2.MS_ID WHERE MS2.MEM_ID = MS.MEM_ID ) AND P.PAY_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND P.PAY_DATE < TO_DATE(#{to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 GROUP BY
TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
) SELECT d."dt", d."newMemberCount", NVL(s."newSubscriberCount", 0) AS "newSubscriberCount", CASE WHEN d."newMemberCount" > 0 THEN ROUND(NVL(s."newSubscriberCount", 0) / d."newMemberCount") ELSE 0 END AS "conversionRate" -- 신규 가입자 1명당 평균 매출 FROM NEW_MEMBERS d LEFT JOIN NEW_SUBS s ON d."dt" = s."dt" ORDER BY d."dt" ASC

WITH TOTAL_REVENUE AS ( SELECT
TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "dt", SUM(P.PAY_AMOUNT) AS "totalRevenue" FROM PAYMENT P WHERE 1=1 AND P.PAY_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND P.PAY_DATE < TO_DATE(#{to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 GROUP BY
TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
), NEW_SUB_REVENUE AS ( SELECT
TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "dt", SUM(P.PAY_AMOUNT) AS "newSubscriberRevenue" FROM PAYMENT P JOIN MEMBER_SUBSCRIPTION MS ON P.MS_ID = MS.MS_ID WHERE P.PAY_DATE = ( SELECT MIN(P2.PAY_DATE) FROM PAYMENT P2 JOIN MEMBER_SUBSCRIPTION MS2 ON P2.MS_ID = MS2.MS_ID WHERE MS2.MEM_ID = MS.MEM_ID ) AND P.PAY_DATE >= TO_DATE(#{from}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND P.PAY_DATE < TO_DATE(#{to}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 GROUP BY
TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') TO_CHAR(P.PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
) SELECT d."dt", NVL(d."totalRevenue", 0) AS "totalRevenue", NVL(s."newSubscriberRevenue", 0) AS "newSubscriberRevenue", CASE WHEN d."totalRevenue" > 0 THEN ROUND((NVL(s."newSubscriberRevenue", 0) / d."totalRevenue") * 100, 2) ELSE 0 END AS "newRevenueRate" -- 신규 매출 비율 (%) FROM TOTAL_REVENUE d LEFT JOIN NEW_SUB_REVENUE s ON d."dt" = s."dt" ORDER BY d."dt" ASC
